name: IMAGI!
description:
IMAGI! IMAGI is a ROBLOX fan game that I have been working on for quite a bit.

Enjoy ;)

Current Version: Version 0.3

Official IMAGI! Website https://imagii.wixsite.com/imagi . You can download studio on the website.

NOTE: To play older versions of the game you must download the HTML file.

                                                    Updates and Patches

Version 0.1: Game Released!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 0.2: Added a leave game button, bug fixes, HALLOWEEN UPDATE!, Player Update, Studio update and a new Loading Screen!

Now you can add zombies to your game in the studio!

2 New Games added!

Main Character now wears a pumpkin on their head!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 0.3: Added another game to halloween update!
